pkgmetadata.longdescription: Shiny for Python================See the [Shiny for Python website](https://shiny.rstudio.com/py/).## InstallationTo install the latest release from PyPI:```shpip install shiny```To install the latest development version from this repository:```shpip install https://github.com/rstudio/py-shiny/tarball/main```More detailed installation instructions, including the use of `conda`, are [also available](https://shiny.rstudio.com/py/docs/install.html).## DevelopmentIf you want to do development on Shiny for Python:```shpip install -e ".[dev,docs,test]"```Additionally, you can install pre-commit hooks which will automatically reformat and lint the code when you make a commit:```shpre-commit install# To disable:# pre-commit uninstall```
